Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    zipkin.storage.AsyncSpanConsumer
    use SpanConsumer
    zipkin.storage.AsyncSpanStore
    use SpanStore
    zipkin.storage.Callback
    use Callback
    zipkin.Codec
    use SpanBytesEncoder and SpanBytesDecoder
    zipkin.collector.CollectorComponent
    use zipkin2.collector.CollectorComponent from io.zipkin.zipkin2:zipkin-collector
    zipkin.collector.CollectorMetrics
    use zipkin2.collector.CollectorMetrics from io.zipkin.zipkin2:zipkin-collector
    zipkin.Component
    use Component
    zipkin.SpanDecoder
    use SpanBytesDecoder
    zipkin.storage.SpanStore
    use SpanStore
    zipkin.storage.StorageComponent
    use StorageComponent
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    zipkin.Annotation
    use Annotation
    zipkin.BinaryAnnotation
    use Span.tags()
    zipkin.collector.Collector
    use zipkin2.collector.Collector from io.zipkin.zipkin2:zipkin-collector
    zipkin.collector.CollectorSampler
    use zipkin2.collector.CollectorSampler from io.zipkin.zipkin2:zipkin-collector
    zipkin.Constants
    zipkin.DependencyLink
    use DependencyLink
    zipkin.Endpoint
    use Endpoint
    zipkin.InMemoryCollectorMetrics
    this class was accidentally put in the package "zipkin" instead of "zipkin.collector". Will be removed in Zipkin 2.
    zipkin.collector.InMemoryCollectorMetrics
    use zipkin2.collector.InMemoryCollectorMetrics from io.zipkin.zipkin2:zipkin-collector
    zipkin.storage.InMemorySpanStore
    use InMemoryStorage
    zipkin.storage.InMemoryStorage
    use InMemoryStorage
    zipkin.storage.QueryRequest
    use QueryRequest
    zipkin.Span
    use Span
    zipkin.TraceKeys
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    zipkin.collector.Collector.acceptSpans(List<byte[]>, SpanDecoder, Callback<Void>)
    All transports accept encoded lists of spans. Please update reporters to do so.
    zipkin.Endpoint.create(String, int, int)
    as leads to null pointer exceptions on port. Use Endpoint.builder() instead.
    zipkin.DependencyLink.create(String, String, long)
    please use DependencyLink.builder()
    zipkin.storage.SpanStore.getRawTrace(long)
    Please switch to SpanStore.getRawTrace(long, long)
    zipkin.storage.AsyncSpanStore.getRawTrace(long, Callback<List<Span>>)
    Please switch to AsyncSpanStore.getRawTrace(long, long, Callback)
    zipkin.storage.SpanStore.getTrace(long)
    Please switch to SpanStore.getTrace(long, long)
    zipkin.storage.AsyncSpanStore.getTrace(long, Callback<List<Span>>)
    Please switch to AsyncSpanStore.getTrace(long, long, Callback)
    zipkin.collector.CollectorSampler.isSampled(Span)
    use CollectorSampler.isSampled(long, Boolean) as that works with multiple span formats
    zipkin.storage.InMemorySpanStore.traceIds()
    use InMemorySpanStore.getRawTraces()
